mapper.update: UPDATE RESUME SET NAME = #{name}, BIRTHYEAR = #{birthYear}, BIRTHMON = #{birthMon}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthDay}, GENDER = #{gender}, HTEL = #{hTel}, CTEL = #{cTel}, EMAIL = #{email}, SNS = #{sns}, ADDRESS = #{address}, HIGHINIYEAR = #{highIniYear}, HIGHINIMON = #{highIniMon}, HIGHFINYEAR = #{highFinYear}, HIGHFINMON = #{highFinMon}, HIGHNAME = #{highName}, HIGHKIND = #{highKind}, UNIVINIYEAR = #{univIniYear}, UNIVINIMON = #{univIniMon}, UNIVFINYEAR = #{univFinYear}, UNIVFINMON = #{univFinMon}, UNIVNAME = #{univName}, UNIVKIND = #{univKind}, UNIVSCORE = #{univScore}, UNIVMAJOR = #{univMajor}, GRADUINIYEAR = #{graduIniYear}, GRADUINIMON = #{graduIniMon}, GRADUFINYEAR = #{graduFinYear}, GRADUFINMON = #{graduFinMon}, GRADUNAME = #{graduName}, GRADUKIND = #{graduKind}, GRADUSCORE = #{graduScore}, GRADUMAJOR = #{graduMajor}, LICENNAME = #{licenName}, LICENINSTI = #{licenInsti}, LICENGRAD = #{licenGrad}, JOBNAME = #{jobName}, JOBINIYEAR = #{jobIniYear}, JOBINIMON = #{jobIniMon}, JOBFINYEAR = #{jobFinYear}, JOBFINMON = #{jobFinMon}, JOBRANK = #{jobRank}, JOBDEPT = #{jobDept}, JOBCONTENT = #{jobContent}, JOBFIRE = #{jobFire}, LANGNAME = #{langName}, LANGTEST = #{langTest}, LANGSCORE = #{langScore}, LANGDATEYEAR = #{langDateYear}, LANGDATEMON = #{langDateMon}, LANGDATEDAY = #{langDateDay}, AWARDNAME = #{awardName}, AWARDCONTENT = #{awardContent}, AWARDINSTI = #{awardInsti}, AWARDDATEYEAR = #{awardDateYear}, AWARDDATEMON = #{awardDateMon}, AWARDDATEDAY = #{awardDateDay}, ABROADNATION = #{abroadNation}, ABROADINSTI = #{abroadInsti}, ABROADCONT = #{abroadCont}, VETE = #{vete}, HANDI = #{handi}, MILIT = #{milit}, MILITINIYEAR = #{militIniYear}, MILITINIMON = #{militIniMon}, MILITFINYEAR = #{militFinYear}, MILITFINMON = #{militFinMon}, MILITKIND = #{militKind}, MILITRANK = #{militRank} WHERE USERID = #{userId}
